name: Oarc's Space Program
description:
[This is a VERY ROUGH prototype still. Don't expect things to work great... or at all.]

I'm currently leaning towards making a package delivery game... Give it a try if you land on this page and let me know what you think! Currently all you can do is fly around, land on planets/moons and launch some packages at a couple of targets.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to control rocket direction
    • QE for roll
  • Space bar for thrust
  • Mouse
    • Press and hold left mouse to launch packages
    • Hold Right Button + Mouse Move to rotate camera
    • Scroll wheel for zoom
    • Shift + Left Button to select target
      • Select planets/objects to provide a target icon.
      • Select anywhere to clear.
    • Alt + Left Button to change camera target
  • H to focus the camera back on your ship
  • TAB switches to turret camera
  • ESC returns from package camera to ship camera OR takes you to the pause menu.
